data.name: Foundation Verification
data.description: Confirm all Prework dependencies are operational before W1 execution begins.
data.acceptance_criteria: ["Core rulebook registered in book registry","Workflow lifecycle engine operational","Event system can emit and log events","Artifact registration works","Existing review analysis accessible"]

data.name: Book Registry Operational
data.description: Core rulebook entry exists and is queryable

data.name: Workflow Engine Operational
data.description: Can create W1 workflow run and transition states

data.name: Analysis Data Accessible
data.description: Existing review analysis loads correctly

data.name: Planning Pipeline
data.description: Enable PM agent to consume review analysis and produce improvement plans.
data.acceptance_criteria: ["PM agent can read/parse existing review analysis","PM produces structured improvement plan","Plan includes measurable success criteria","Plan respects token cost constraints","Plan registered as workflow artifact"]

data.name: PM Agent Functional
data.description: PM agent can be invoked with correct inputs

data.name: Plan Output Valid
data.description: PM produces plan targeting top 3 severity issues

data.name: Plan Artifact Registered
data.description: Improvement plan saved in workflow_artifacts

data.name: Planning Pipeline
data.description: Enable Writer, Editor, Domain Expert agents to modify, review, and approve/reject content.
data.acceptance_criteria: ["Writer agent can modify markdown files","Writer outputs change log","Editor can review and pass/fail","Domain Expert can review and pass/fail","Rejection routing works","Max 3 rejections before escalation","All agent actions emit events"]

data.name: Writer Agent Functional
data.description: Writer can read plan and produce modified markdown

data.name: Editor Review Operational
data.description: Editor can review and produce pass/fail

data.name: Domain Expert Review Operational
data.description: Domain Expert can review and produce pass/fail

data.name: Rejection Routing Works
data.description: Rejection routes back to Writer with feedback

data.name: Escalation Works
data.description: 3+ rejections triggers human escalation

data.name: Validation Pipeline
data.description: Verify changes improved targeted metrics through chapter-level re-review.
data.acceptance_criteria: ["Chapter review targets only changed chapters","Results comparable to baseline metrics","PM can evaluate metrics improvement","Failed metrics routes back to PM","Metrics comparison logged with before/after"]

data.name: Chapter Review Scoping Works
data.description: Review accepts chapter whitelist

data.name: Metrics Comparison Available
data.description: Before/after scores calculated

data.name: Metrics Routing Works
data.description: Failed metrics triggers route to PM

data.name: Human Gate
data.description: Present changes to human for final approval before artifact promotion.
data.acceptance_criteria: ["Human receives clear change summary","Human receives metrics comparison","Human can approve/reject with feedback","Human gate status tracked in workflow"]

data.name: Human Summary Generated
data.description: Clear change summary and metrics diff

data.name: Human Decision Captured
data.description: Approval/rejection recorded in workflow

data.name: Finalization
data.description: Promote approved changes to all output formats and create release notes.
data.acceptance_criteria: ["New print HTML generated","New PDF draft generated","New web HTML generated","Release notes created","All artifacts registered with version linkage","Output version ID recorded"]

data.name: Print HTML Generated
data.description: Updated print HTML from approved markdown

data.name: PDF Generated
data.description: PDF draft from print HTML

data.name: Web HTML Generated
data.description: Web-optimized HTML for site

data.name: Release Notes Created
data.description: Summary document of all changes

data.name: All Artifacts Registered
data.description: Every output in workflow_artifacts

data.agenda: ["Review proposal and objectives","VP Product phase breakdown","VP Engineering technical tasks","VP Operations execution schedule","Identify blockers","CEO decision"]
data.action_items: ["Review and approve session plan","Begin Phase 1 implementation after approval","Monitor execution against schedule"]
data.next_steps: Await CEO approval, then begin Phase 1
